modules.module_name: Week 1: Introduction, General Principles & Vector Operations

materials.name: Instructor Information
materials.description: Professor: Tedd Wong, E-mail: twong76@mtsac.edu, Office Phone: 909-274-4425, Office Location: 61-2505, Office Hours: 6:30 pm MW before class and 8:25 MW after class.

materials.name: Course Details
materials.description: Course: ENGR 40 – Statics. Duration: August 26 - Dec 15. Units: 3. Vector approach to static equilibrium of rigid bodies, forces, couples in two and three- dimensional space. PRE-REQUISITES: PHYS 4A and MATH 181 (Calc 2).

materials.name: Required Materials
materials.description: Textbook: Engineering Mechanics: Statics, by R.C. Hibbeler, 15th ed. Also needed: Standard note-taking supplies, a scientific calculator (NCEES/SAT/ACT approved), a straight-edge. Quad rule pad (graph paper) is highly recommended.

materials.name: Course Web Site
materials.description: Canvas will be used for announcements, lecture notes, homework solutions and for submitting assignments. Access via the Mt. SAC portal (http://inside.mtsac.edu).

materials.name: Lecture L1: General Principles
materials.description: Topic: Chapter 1 - General Principles, Chapter 2.1 - Scalars and Vectors.

materials.name: Lecture L2: Vector Operations
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 2.2 - Vector Operations, Chapter 2.3 - Vector Addition of Forces, Chapter 2.4 - Addition of Coplanar Forces.

materials.name: Lecture L3: Vectors in Depth
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 2.5 - Cartesian Vectors, Chapter 2.6 - Addition of Cartesian Vectors, Chapter 2.7 - Position Vectors, Chapter 2.8 - Line Force Vectors, Chapter 2.9 - Dot Product.

materials.name: Lecture L4: Particle Equilibrium
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 3.1 - Equilibrium of Particle, Chapter 3.2 - FBD of Particle, Chapter 3.3 - Coplanar Forces.

materials.name: Lecture L5: 3-D Force
materials.description: Topic: Chapter 3.4 - 3-D Force.

quiz_assignments.name: Midterm #1
quiz_assignments.description: First midterm exam covering material from weeks 1-3.

materials.name: Midterm Review
materials.description: Review session for Midterm #1.

materials.name: Lecture L7: Scalar Moments
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 4.1 - Scalar Moments, Chapter 4.2 - Principle of Moments.

materials.name: Lecture L8: Vector Moments
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 4.3 - Cross Product, Chapter 4.4 - Vector Moments About a Point-3D, Chapter 4.5 - Vector Moments About an Axis-3D.

materials.name: Lecture L9: Force and Couple Systems
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 4.6 - Moment of a Couple, Chapter 4.7 - Simplify Force and Couple - Force and Moment.

materials.name: Lecture L10 & L11 & L12: Rigid Body Equilibrium
materials.description: Topics covering Chapters 4.8, 4.9, and 5.1 through 5.7, including Distributed Loading, Equilibrium of Rigid Body, FBDs, and Equations of Equilibrium.

materials.name: Midterm Review
materials.description: Review session for Midterm #2.

materials.name: Lecture L13 & L14: Structural Analysis - Trusses
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 6.1 - Trusses, Chapter 6.2 - Method of Joints (MOJ), Chapter 6.3 - Zero Force Members, Chapter 6.4 - Method of Sections (MOS).

materials.name: Lecture L15 & L16: Frames and Machines
materials.description: Topic: Chapter 6.6 - Frames and Machines.

materials.name: Midterm Review and Project Introduction
materials.description: Review for Midterm #3 and introduction to the course project.

materials.name: Lecture L17a & L17b: Internal Forces
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 7.1 - Internal Loadings, Chapter 7.2 - Shear and Moment Diagrams, Chapter 7.3 - Distributed Loading, Shear and Moment.

materials.name: Lecture L18 & L19: Friction and Applications
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 8.1 - Dry Friction, Chapter 8.2 - Dry Friction Problems, Chapter 8.3 - Wedges, Chapter 8.4 - Screws, Chapter 8.5 - Belts.

materials.name: Project Build
materials.description: In-class time dedicated to working on the group project.

materials.name: Project Demo
materials.description: Demonstration of group projects.

modules.module_name: Week 15: Centroids and Moment of Inertia

materials.name: Lecture L20: Center of Gravity and Centroids
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 9.1 - CG, CM, and Centroids, Chapter 9.2 - Composite Bodies.

materials.name: Lecture L21: Moment of Inertia
materials.description: Topics: Chapter 10.1 - Moment of Inertia, Chapter 10.2 - Parallel-Axis Theorem.

assignments.name: Group Project
assignments.description: The final group project submission is due.

quiz_assignments.name: Final Exam
quiz_assignments.description: Cumulative final exam held on Monday, December 9th from 7:30 pm to 10:00 pm in room 61-2311.

materials.name: Final Topics
materials.description: Topic: Chapter 10.4 - Moment of Inertia for Composite Areas.
